item.title: Defender Experts’ recommendations for impactful security posture management
item.description: Introduction The Microsoft Defender Experts for XDR service provides value to customers from both a proactive and reactive perspective. Proactively, we provide guidance to customers on overall security posture improvements and perform threat hunting to surface malicious activity in their environments. Simultaneously, our team reactively investigates and responds to incidents that occur in customer environments on their behalf.
